data.title: New Mexico State University - BE BOLD. Shape the Future.
data.text:
Announcements

Announcements:

IMPORTANT: Reminder to send out your accommodation notifications for the upcoming Summer semesters after May 15th. You can find step by step instructions under the Student Tab by selecting Process for Current DAS Students. You can also access our video tutorials on the process under the Video How Toâ€™s Link. You can make your requests as soon as you would like. We do not release all the notifications until 2 days prior to the start of classes to ensure they don't get overlooked. Please call our office if you have any questions.

RETURNING, GRADUATE STUDENTS, AND STUDENTS WITH INTERNSHIPS/CLINICALS: Please don't forget to set an appointment with our office to discuss any adjustments to accommodations, clinical or internship accommodations, or Graduate School accommodations as early as you can before the start of the Fall 2024 Semester. This is necessary if you have not updated your accommodations that you received as an undergraduate as they may not translate over to graduate courses very well. For returning students that took a semester or more off, you will need to meet with us to re-activate your accommodations.

Students if you have transferred to another NMSU campus for are coming from another NMSU campus, please call our office to notify us so that we can assist with transferring your accommodations to your new campus accessibility office.

IMPORTANT DATES AND DEADLINES:

STUDENTS WITH APPROVED ESA'S: On August 19th and 20th 2024, we will be issuing the new ESA license tags in the DAS office between 8am-5pm for the Fall 2024-Spring 2025 semester. You will need to turn in your old tag and pick up your new tag which will be a different color for the upcoming year. You will also need to provide updated vaccinations for your animal and updated roommate approval forms. If you do not pick up your new tag and renew your paperwork BEFORE August 21, your ESA approval will be suspended until the following semester.

NEW ESA REQUESTS: Any ESA accommodation applications submitted after August 9th, 2024 will not be processed until after census day, Friday September 6, 2024. Any ESA applications submitted after October 25th, 2024 will be processed for the start of the Spring 2025 semester. No emotional support animals should be in campus housing unless they are fully approved through our office. Any unauthorized animals found in campus housing may not be assessed until the following semester.

If you run into any issues or have any questions please feel free to email us or give us a call at das@nmsu.edu or 575-646-6840.

Thank you.
